msbt.message: , is that you?! It IS!<10_4 /> It's been, uh<10_10 />It's been <50_8 x="0" y="2" a="years" b="year" c="years" />!<10_9 />Why did you leave me alone for so long?! I was TRÈS worried about you! And worrying me is an offense punishable byhanging out with me!

Huh? ?! NO way! It's been <50_8 x="0" y="2" a="years" b="year" c="years" /> and <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" /> since I saw you last!Yes. I counted. I have a notebook where I mark the days. And the pages are all tearstained!I'm SO happy to see you, but please don't disappear again, 'K? I'm glad you look good, though!

Welcome back, ! I missed you so bad!I was legit SO worried you'd never come back again! But you diiiiiiid!Don't worry, I'm still the number one pop star of .Everybody here has missed you! I'm so glad you're back!
Ohmigosh, ! How could you just disappear without telling me anything?!Anyhoo I'm glad you're back! We're going to hang out lots, 'K?
Ohmigosh! ! I haven't seen you in FOREVER!You have a different vibe about you Have you been having adventures without me? Well, whatever! Welcome back! And no more disappearing on me, 'K?

Oh! ! It's been a while! How are you?!Were you away practicing your favorite hobby, ? Huh? That's not your hobby? Whatever! You shouldn't have disappeared without saying anything!Now you have to make up for lost time by hanging out with me! We've got a lot of fun to catch up on!

! I haven't seen you for a bit. Were you on vacay or something? Geez, you could've told me! I was SOOOOOOOO Ahem! Heh I was just the teensiest bit worried! Anyhoo, I'm glad you're back! Don't pull that disappearing act again, 'K?

Hi! I'm , aka aspiring future pop star!I meant that as a joke, but I'm sad. We haven't talked in <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" />! I thought you'd totes forgotten meI've missed you! Don't be afraid to say hey to me, 'K?! I like you a bunch!

! It's been a while! Where have you been?<10_4 /> Huh? You weren't gone for long? Ohmigosh! Was I the only one who didn't see much of you, ? I guess we both got caught up in chasing dreams, huh?! We should slow down and chat. I totes always have time to chat whenever you want! And I always have a lot to say!No. Seriously. Some days, I have SO much to say.

! Why weren't you talking to me even though you were around?! Wait! Have you been practicing your dancing skills in secret?! As, like, a surprise for me?! Well, I'll pretend to be très surprised when you finally bust those moves!
